## Examples

**Left only**

```js
<ButtonBar
    leftButtons={<Button type="danger">Delete</Button>}
/>
```

**Right only**

```js
<ButtonBar
    rightButtons={<Button type="primary">Save</Button>}
/>
```

**Left and right**

```js
<ButtonBar
    leftButtons={<Button type="danger">Delete</Button>}
    rightButtons={[
        <Button type="primary" ghost>
            Save and Continue
        </Button>,
        <Button type="primary">SAVE</Button>,
    ]}
/>
```
